page.title: 05DRURIDGE BAY MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: Druridge Bay Middle School is 22 years old.While the present school was being built the children went to a school at Red Row.At that time the present building was a high school. Later an extra block was added beside the main building.This is now used as a teaching block for first year children, and it also houses the public library.In the block there are 4 classrooms and in the main building there are 15 classrooms and a gym.The classrooms have changed from the school at Red Row as the windows were higher up and at our school they are lower down. An english room was a music room.We know this because of the stave lines on the blackboard. In the first year the teachers are:Miss Stanton,Mrs.Hawgood and Mrs.Dunn.
